title: THERMO-COOL TIE HAT/DOO RAG - Army ACU Digital - Made in the USA
features: Color: Army ACU Digital. Made in the USA
Utilizes Thermo-Cool's unique cooling fabric - No crystals or beads
Just soak in cold water for 3-5 minutes to activate cooling
Will not get slimy like other cooling products
description: Stay cool with the Thermo-Cool Tie Hat/Doo Rag. Just soak in cool water for 3 to 5 minutes to activate cooling. Will not get slimy or bunch up like other brands. Utilizes Thermo-Cool's unique cooling fabric ...no crystals or beads. Quality made in the USA. Cooling area is 2" x 10" ....keeps your head cool. To clean: Wash by hand with mild detergent and hang to dry. Instructions sewn on each tie hat.  The Army ACU Digital Qwik Cooler Tie is a great gift to send to our soldiers. Also great for camping, sports, gardening, fishing and anytime you want to feel cool!
